content.body: Regarding the pseudo-element discussion I think it would be very helpful to have concrete use cases. Because I worry this is designing something that doesn't actually solve use cases. It gives web authors maybe some of the stuff they want to solve use cases. For example, `::backdrop` keeps being mentioned. What do authors want to do with it? We have closedby=any for the light dismiss case now. Can we perhaps look at more things like that?
